Description:
Detects Windows update errors including installation failures and connection issues. Defenders should observe this in case critical update KBs aren't installed.


Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Windows Update Error
Query: sourcetype='windows-system' eql select * from _source_ where provider_name = 'microsoft-windows-windowsupdateclient' and (eventid = '16' or eventid = '20' or eventid = '24' or eventid = '213' or eventid = '217')
